product_name: Pearl Izumi P.R.O. Leader Bike Jersey - Men's
long_description: Lead the pack in the men's P.R.O. Leader Bike Jersey, with its advanced fabric technology, construction methods and aerodynamic fit that meet the highest level of Pearl Izumi performance. P.R.O. Transfer In-R-Cool(R) fabric powered by coldblack(R) technology enhances wicking, drying and sun reflectivity so you actually feel 5 degrees cooler. Laser-cut Direct-Vent panels excel at ventilation; full-length front zipper also optimizes venting. Anatomical paneling creates a performance fit. Body provides UPF 50+ sun protection; sleeves provide UPF 40 sun protection. Elasticized gripper on back keeps hem in place. 3 back pockets, plus a sweat-proof pocket. Bonded structural element on back helps prevent pocket sag. Reflective elements on the men's Pearl Izumi P.R.O. Leader Bike Jersey enhance low-light visibility.
short_description: Lead the pack in the men's P.R.O. Leader Bike Jersey, with its advanced fabric technology, construction methods and aerodynamic fit that meet the highest level of Pearl Izumi performance.
